destinations.name: TajMahal
destinations.description: Located in Agra, India, this iconic white marble mausoleum was built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal. It's a UNESCO World Heritage site and symbolizes eternal love.

destinations.name: HawaMahal
destinations.description: Situated in Jaipur, Rajasthan, the Palace of Windsis known for its unique honeycomb structure with 953 small windows. Built for royal ladies to observe street festivals, it showcases beautiful Rajput architecture.

destinations.name: AmberFort
destinations.description: Located in Amer, near Jaipur, this grand fort is known for its blend of Hindu and Mughal architectural styles. Famous for its intricate mirror work and scenic views, it served as the residence of Rajput royals.

destinations.name: WTP
destinations.description: A modern architectural marvel in Jaipur, this shopping mall features an impressive design and a wide array of international brands, entertainment options, and restaurants, making it a major attraction.

crew.name: Douglas Hurley
crew.bio: This app transformed my trip! I loved the interactive maps and virtual guides that made exploring so much easier. Learning about each site’s history while standing there was an unforgettable experience.

crew.name: Mark Shuttleworth
crew.bio: Using this app was an incredible experience! As a tourist, I found the guided routes and the option to explore destinations virtually to be super helpful—it felt like I had a personal guide with me at all times. The virtual history videos at each location added so much depth to my trip, giving me a real sense of each place’s heritage.

crew.name: Head
crew.bio: As a first-time visitor, the app was a lifesaver. It guided me smoothly through every location and provided fascinating video insights on each place’s heritage—perfect for curious travelers like me!

crew.name: Anousheh Ansari
crew.bio: Absolutely loved using this app! The virtual tours and historical videos added so much value to my journey, and it felt like I was exploring with a personal guide by my side.

technology.name: Empowering Self-Guided Exploration
technology.description: Tripsage is crafted for independent travelers seeking an eco-friendly, guided experience without hiring a guide. Our app combines convenience and discovery for seamless self-guided tours.

technology.name: Navigate with Ease and Insight
technology.description: Using Google Maps integration, Tripsage guides visitors to destinations while unlocking rich history and cultural details upon arrival, enriching every journey.

technology.name: Sustainable and Immersive Travel
technology.description: We promote eco-friendly travel, encouraging users to explore responsibly and gain in-depth insights, making every trip both impactful and memorable.
